tortuosity syndrome is a rare disorder; its prevalence is unknown. About 100 cases have been reported in the medical literature.,GHR,arterial tortuosity syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to arterial tortuosity syndrome ?,"Arterial tortuosity syndrome is caused by mutations in the SLC2A10 gene. This gene provides instructions for making a protein called GLUT10. The level of GLUT10 appears to be involved in the regulation of a process called the transforming growth factor-beta (TGF-) s
